identity.title: Construct a function that returns a list of remainders from the input.

content.prompt: Construct a program which calculates the remainder of each element of the first list and the element with the same index in the second list. The remainders are stored in a new list. If the number in the second list is 0, the program should directly add number 2 to the new list instead of the remainder. Finally, the program should print the new list.
